dev-1.x.name: drupal/b2_drupal_plus

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Drupal Plus is a Google Plus inspired theme. It is a really clean theme with few colors, easy to read, nice for web applications. It has a fixed width, supports logo, drup down primary links, 2 or 3 column layouts tested in IE6, IE7, IE8, Firefox 2, Firefox 3, Safari 3.2 & Chrome. The base for the theme has been created in Artisteer 3 utility, and then has been manually modified.

1.0.0.name: drupal/b2_drupal_plus

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy
